LanguageData.VBE_MixologyResearch.label: mixology
LanguageData.VBE_MixologyResearch.description: Allows construction of advanced machines that utilize electricity for perfect fermenting, industrial bottling, and the mixing of cocktails at the bar workbench.
LanguageData.VBE_LiquorBrewing.label: liquor brewing
LanguageData.VBE_LiquorBrewing.description: Utilize advanced brewing techniques that allow distillation and fermenting of harder spirits with unique effects.
